localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! ⠀ Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
blogPost.body: Branch is your space for work and play! ⠀ Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
blogPost.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Branch 是您工作和娱乐的空间 ⠀ 通过协作和有趣的虚拟总部，让远程工作中缺少的偶然性、自发的对话、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新回归。
Branch 是您工作和娛樂的空間 ⠀ 通過協作和有趣的虛擬總部，讓遠程工作中缺少的偶然性、自發的對話、走廊上的碰撞、水杯聊天等重新迴歸。

previous.title:
There used to be a TV channel whose only purpose was to show what was on all the other channels. 

Still no flying cars, but we’ve come a long way.

localize.full_text:
以前有一个电视频道 它的唯一目的就是播放其他所有频道的节目。

仍然没有飞车，但我们已经走了很长的路。

以前有一個電視頻道 它的唯一目的就是播放其他所有頻道的節目。

仍然沒有飛車，但我們已經走了很長的路。

next.excerpt: Collaborate without burnout. Replace back-to-back meetings with voice messaging groups. No calendars, no video chats, just back and forth voice messaging groups. Meet on your own time and take back your calendar.
next.title: Yac Meet - Create and share async meeting links

localize.description: 协作无倦怠。用语音消息组取代背靠背的会议。没有日历，没有视频聊天，只有来回的语音消息组。在您自己的时间开会，收回您的日历。
localize.tagline: 创建和共享异步会议链接

localize.description: 協作無倦怠。用語音消息組取代背靠背的會議。沒有日曆，沒有視頻聊天，只有來回的語音消息組。在您自己的時間開會，收回您的日曆。
localize.tagline: 創建和共享異步會議鏈接
